about_the_game:
FIRESTORM DEADLAND

FireStorm Deadland is a first-person shooter survival horror game where you control the shoes of a foot soldier part of an elite task force unit.

Welcome to the year 2063 where you have to survive in an world conquered by unHumans.

The WMG (World Military Government) is putting all the money and resources into the Colony Space Program. So people are rioting on the streets, trying to have food to survive and enough salaries to pay their bills. Until an unknown virus is released on the world that turns people into hungry brainless unHumans controlled by a bigger system.

Your job as foot soldier is to fight those giant waves of unHumans on the streets to save the world and trying to discover where the virus came from along with your team.

Choose from a variety of different locations and defend yourself and your team against infinite hords of unHumans that lurk in the darkness.

Explore the locations and get new weapons, armors, suits, and more and survive as much time as you can.

  • Explore many different locations and defend them.
  • Defeat a very big number of different mutated unHumans as they get smarter and harder to kill.
  • Discover a new unknown species controlling the unHumans.
  • Gather or buy new weapons, armors, suits and more.
  • Survive as much time as you can.
  • Talk and Interact with other players.
  • Invite up to 3 other players to join you.
  • and much more...

Many other features will be added in the future.

Note: This game is developed by DragonStorm.
